title: Prestacycle shows world’s smallest, lightest pump, new tire plugger ratchet & more
content:
Prestacycle’s new Prestaflator Micro CO2 inflator chuck has a couple tricks up its sleeve. For starters, it threads onto a presta valve stem, so it won’t accidentally blow off and waste precious CO2. And it comes with a thick neoprene sleeve for your cartridge, so it won’t freeze your hands, which is good because you

The post Prestacycle shows world’s smallest, lightest pump, new tire plugger ratchet & more appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
